metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35654 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Pillow before 8.1.0, TiffDecode has a heap-based buffer overflow when decoding crafted YCbCr files because of certain interpretation conflicts with LibTIFF in RGBA mode.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per upstream, affects 6.0.0 to 8.0.1, and only when used with libtiff 4.1.0 in focal, not 4.0.9 in bionic

criterions.comment: pillow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
